original_text: Now the Valley of Siddim was full of tar pits, and when the kings of Sodom and Gomorrah fled, some of the men fell into them and the rest fled to the hills.
korean_text: 싯딤 골짜기에는 역청 구덩이가 많은지라 소돔 왕과 고모라 왕이 달아날 때에 그들이 거기 빠지고 그 나머지는 산으로 도망하매

sentences.original_text: Now the Valley of Siddim was full of tar pits
and when the kings of Sodom and Gomorrah fled
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 소돔과 고모라 왕들이 도망할 때

sentences.original_text: some of the men fell into them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 사람들은 역무덤에 빠졌고

sentences.original_text: and the rest fled to the hills
